column5: Cabelas Canada has the HB 1157C combo on sale for $1199 from $1999  http://www.cabelas.ca/index.cfm?pageID=71&section=1186&section2=1674&ID=27813
At those prices I'm not surprised....the 1158c unit that replaced it is $2199.99...Ouch.
Is it the one with new improved screen like the 1197?
I'm not sure.....I'm really a Lowrance guy....(I guess you referring to the 1159c unit)
